about_the_game:
FEATURES:

BEFORE BUYING: This game is an experiment, a short horror experience. It's a scare simulator. Solve the puzzles, and find the secret. Keep quiet at all times so you don't get killed. It might contain bugs, I'm a solo developer with a tight budget.


  • A 19 years old single developer created this project.
  • Short horror game, cheap, and immersive.
  • Walking simulator, if you don't like these, then don't play.
  • Remember that your microphone is constantly listening.
  • DON'T SHOUT!
  • Check every room, zoom-in on each clue to collect it.

A WORRIED BOYFRIEND, POSSIBLE UNFAITHFUL WOMAN


Step into the shoes of Luca, a worried boyfriend who has questions about his girlfriend's fidelity. She has been distant and weirdly acting lately. Fortunately, she is out of town, and you have located her spare keys, so you decide to enter her home to seek signs that she is cheating.

Luca ventures into the unknown, determined to discover the truth about his girlfriend Kate. As he goes deeper into the research, he realizes that the blackness in the shadows hides secrets far more horrifying than he could have imagined.

AN INTERACTIVE EXPERIENCE THAT WILL LEAVE YOUR BLOOD RUNNING COLD.


Immerse yourself in a high-quality horror experience full of fascinating puzzles. Your microphone is continually listening, making every playthrough unique. DON'T SCREAM OR IT'S GAME OVER.

WHAT DOES LEFT TO ROT OFFER?


Left to Rot offers 30 minutes to 1 hour of gameplay full of scary situations that will make your blood run cold. Impressive graphics, animations, and sound design all contribute to the overall ambiance.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood, flashing lights, loud noises, and jumpscares. Viewer discretion is advised.

short_description: Left to Rot is a walking simulator psychological horror game. You take on the role of Luca, a young man caught up in a horrific mystery. If you make noise... It's game over! (You will need a Microphone)!
